column4: Hi I need to edit my sources.list file. How can I launch Kate from command line with admin rights?
sudo kate /etc/apt/sources.list but if you have to ask you might be better using the gui
I had done it your way and it failed, hence my asking. kdesu also fails, and gksu is not installed. ... Ah, now it works... hmm what did I do differently?
are you running gnome or kde ?
